#afcon2023 Match Review: In a thrilling match, Equatorial Guinea üá¨üá∂ secured a 4-2 victory over Guinea-Bissau üá¨üáº Captain Emilio Nsue showcased leadership with a powerful strike in the 21st minute. An own goal by Esteban Orozco Fernandez in the 37th minute leveled the score, but VAR overturned a penalty in the 42nd minute, providing relief to Equatorial Guinea. In the second half, Equatorial Guinea took control, with Emilio Nsue completing a hat trick before Josete Miranda‚Äôs goal in the 46th minute. Despite Guinea-Bissau‚Äôs late effort with Z√© Turbo scoring in stoppage time, it wasn‚Äôt enough to overcome Equatorial Guinea‚Äôs lead. Second-half review: Equatorial Guinea wasted no time in the second half, hungry to break the deadlock. Josete Miranda capitalized on a defensive error in the 46th minute, giving Equatorial Guinea a 2-1 lead. Emilio Nsue continued to shine, netting his second goal in the 51st minute. Despite Guinea-Bissau‚Äôs late effort with Z√© Turbo scoring in stoppage time, it wasn‚Äôt enough to overcome Equatorial Guinea‚Äôs lead. Emilio Nsue completed his hat trick, sealing the second-half victory with a final score of 4-2 for Equatorial Guinea. ‚öΩ The business behind the UEFA EURO 2024 üîó https://lnkd.in/e-u9YzG2 The UEFA European Championships (EURO) 2024 kick-off today, marking the start of a month-long football festivity, filled with public viewings, cold beers and emotional distress from 11 men kicking around a ball for your nation. But how does it compare to the other major international football properties, the UEFA Champions League and FIFA World Cup: ‚ö° The EURO 2020 final attracted 600m unique viewers, above the 450m of the Champions League final, but a far cry from the 1.5bn of the World Cup final 2022 (additional reference: Women's EURO 2022 hit 50m and the Super Bowl 2024 reached 250m) ‚ö°EURO 2024 is forecast to generate ‚Ç¨2.44bn in revenues, trailing the Champions League's ‚Ç¨3.23bn and only ~41% of the 2022 World Cup's massive ‚Ç¨5.89bn ‚ö° EURO format change in 2016 (expanding from 16 to 24 teams) lead to 20 more games and a subsequent increase in revenues; the Champions League (125 to 189 games) and the World Cup (32 to 48 teams, 64 to 104 games) are both expanding formats in their next iteration, further widening the revenue gap to the EURO Tier-1 properties increasingly dominate today's media landscape, sucking up all the attention and revenues. The EURO firmly belongs among the tier-1 properties in international football, featuring nearly all global football powerhouses (besides Brazil and Argentina). As such, revenues will continue to grow, but it will be interesting to see if this suffices for UEFA or whether they tweak the format again to keep up with the Champions League and the World Cup. üèÜ PS: England, France, Germany, Spain and Portugal (in this order) are the bookmakers favorites to win the tournament For more details, check out the full piece and enjoy the read!üòÑ Thanks for your interest and stay tuned for more üôå #football #uefa #EURO2024 #sportbusiness #finance #fifa #worldcup #championsleague

Uruguay 5-0 Bolivia: A Commanding Display Uruguay left no room for doubt about their intentions in Copa Am√©rica 2024, demolishing Bolivia with a 5-0 victory. Panama 2-1 USA: A Shocking Turn of Events In a match filled with drama and tension, Panama edged out the United States with a 2-1 victory, putting the USA's Copa Am√©rica hopes in jeopardy. Despite playing with ten men after Timothy Weah's red card, the USA took the lead through Folarin Balogun. However, Panama responded with goals from Cesar Blackman and Jos√© Fajardo, securing a famous victory. Key Takeaways and Future Implications üîπ Uruguay's Path to Knockouts: Uruguay‚Äôs dominant performance has showcased their strength and strategic prowess, positioning them as a formidable contender. üîπ USA's Uncertain Future: The defeat against Panama leaves the USA's Copa Am√©rica hopes hanging by a thread, facing an uphill battle to progress. üîπ Panama's Rising Confidence: Panama's victory is a testament to their resilience and ability to perform under pressure, boosting their chances of advancing in the tournament. üìñ For a detailed analysis and more insights, read our full blog post. üëâ Read the full blog post here: https://lnkd.in/eHYKKBvn #CopaAmerica2024 #Football #Uruguay #Panama #USA #Bolivia #SportsUpdate #GroupC #MatchHighlights #FootballNews
